text: John Basil Meeking (19 November 1929 â€“ 11 June 2020) was a New Zealand bishop. He was the 7th bishop of Christchurch, New Zealand from 1987 to 1995. Meeking was born in Ashburton, New Zealand. He was made Bishop of Christchurch by Pope John Paul II on 30 March 1987 and resigned on 15 December 1995.Catholic Diocese of Christchurch, Bishop Basil Meeking, Bishop Emeritus of Christchurch (retrieved 28 January 2011) Meeking died in Christchurch on 11 June 2020, aged 90. ==References== Category:New Zealand people Category:Roman Catholic bishops Category:2020 deaths Category:1929 births
title: Basil Meeking
